summary: SayWattPM - Voice-first project management app for electrical project managers with smart scheduling, permit tracking, crew management, and field-optimized features
architectural_notes: Voice-first interaction model - primary input method across all features
Multi-tier freemium monetization: Free, Pro ($29/mo), Team ($49/mo), Enterprise ($99/mo)
Real-time crew availability tracking and conflict detection system
Weather API integration for outdoor task scheduling
CarPlay/Android Auto integration for driving mode
Photo storage with voice annotation and task auto-creation
NEC (National Electrical Code) compliance checklist library
Budget tracking with running burn rate calculations
Time tracking with auto check-in/check-out functionality
known_issues: User unable to log in - authentication system needs debugging
Landing page needs improvement - user experience issues reported
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hero background image showing electrical construction work site with conduit and equipment in warm lighting (landing-hero.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Icon illustration of voice waveform in safety yellow on charcoal background (voice-icon.dim_128x128.png)
- Icon illustration of hard hat with lightning bolt in orange and yellow (safety-icon.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create Material Cost Tracker with Budget vs Actual that allows voice-logging of purchases (e.g., 'Bought 200 feet of 3/4 inch EMT conduit at $1.20 a foot from Home Depot for the hospital job') and displays running budget burn rate

Implement Safety Incident Quick-Log that allows voice reporting of safety issues (e.g., 'Near-miss on the hospital site, Tom tripped over unmarked conduit run in hallway B, need to add temporary lighting'), creates timestamped incident reports, and flags for review

Design a professional frontend UI with a bold, construction-industry aesthetic using warm oranges, deep charcoal grays, and safety yellow accents with a focus on large touch targets, high-contrast text for field visibility, and a rugged, no-nonsense layout that prioritizes speed and voice interaction over visual decoration

Create a dashboard view that displays: upcoming project deadlines, today's scheduled site visits with drive times, active permits requiring attention, crew assignments for the week, recent safety incidents, and quick-access voice input button

Build a project detail view that displays all project information, permits, inspections, crew assignments, material costs vs budget, change orders, communications, photos, safety incidents, and NEC checklists in organized tabs or sections

Debug and fix the authentication system to resolve login failures - verify Internet Identity integration, AuthClient initialization, and identity state management in useInternetIdentity.ts are functioning correctly

Redesign the landing page (pre-authentication view) with improved visual hierarchy, clear value proposition for electrical project managers, prominent login call-to-action, and showcase key features (voice logging, smart scheduling, safety tracking) with construction-themed visuals consistent with the existing orange/charcoal/safety yellow color palette

new_feature_requests.summary: Smart Permit & Inspection Tracker with voice logging and auto-reminders
Crew Conflict Detection for real-time availability across projects
Weather-Aware Scheduling with forecast integration for outdoor tasks

Create a project management system that stores electrical projects with fields: project name, location, status, start date, estimated completion date, client name, general contractor, project value, and notes

Implement Smart Permit & Inspection Tracker that tracks permit status, renewal dates, and inspection results with voice logging capability (e.g., 'Rough-in inspection passed on Riverside, inspector was Dave Morris')
Build Crew Conflict Detection that checks crew member availability across all projects and flags scheduling conflicts in real-time when assigning crew to tasks
Implement Weather-Aware Scheduling that flags outdoor electrical tasks (site lighting, underground runs, solar installations) when weather conditions may impact work
Create Mileage & Drive Time Tracking that auto-logs mileage between job sites and factors drive time into daily scheduling
Build Voice-Activated Job Site Check-In/Check-Out system that timestamps arrival/departure, pulls up project dashboard, and auto-logs time spent on site

Implement Photo + Voice Annotation feature that allows PMs to snap a photo, voice-annotate the issue (e.g., 'Panel box in room 304, wrong breaker size, need to swap to 40 amp'), auto-create a task, and notify crew

Build Change Order Management system that allows voice-creation of change orders (e.g., 'Client wants 4 additional EV charger stations in the parking garage, estimated $18K additional'), logs changes, adjusts project value, and creates approval workflow

Create Client Communication Log that allows voice-logging of client/GC conversations (e.g., 'Just spoke with the GC on Riverside, they want weekly progress photos and pushed the final walkthrough to April 10th'), auto-updates project timeline, and sets new reminders

Build Escalating Smart Reminders System with multi-stage notifications: 90 days (monthly), 60 days (bi-weekly), 30 days (weekly + crew alerts), 14 days (every 3 days), 7 days (daily), 3 days (morning + afternoon), day-of (persistent)
Implement End-of-Day Voice Summary feature that generates an AI-powered daily report from all voice entries, check-ins, task completions, and provides it via dashboard

Create Code Compliance Checklists with pre-built NEC (National Electrical Code) templates by project type that allow voice check-offs (e.g., 'NEC 210.12 â€” AFCI protection verified for bedroom circuits in Building A')
